attributes.action: Abolish all covid passports and vaccine appeasement from media
attributes.additional_details:
attempting to enforce vaccination, including by way of covid passports for entry to public venues is in breach of numerous human rights laws and section 45e of the public Health act of 1984.

in March 2020, COVID-19 was removed from the HCID meaning this is no longer considered to be a High Consequence infectious disease. 

The vaccines in current circulation are also in clinical trial until 2023, clinical trial requires administration ans monitoring of a select few. not the population of the UK
attributes.background: abolish all plans to enforce vaccination and mandates of any form to show proof of COVID-Vaccination

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop any plans for Covid certification plan B scenario: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598581

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

Stop discriminating against the unvaccinated in Covid 19 policy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239
